column4: new piece of rare knowledge: I just solved a problem ive been working on for months! Why is my dbus not working? why do i have to reinstal it? The answer: if you are using safe mode to avoid the splash screen, you also shut off dbus >.< let it be known!
you see, ive had to be in recovery mode every single time because the splash screen cuts my monitor signal off!
if you want to avoid splash screen you could as well remove the splash artworks and manager
